name: Railstodoapp
body:
Just clone the repo
git clone https://github.com/pbssubhash/RailsToDoApp.git Navigate into the folder cd RailsToDoApp/ Use this command to start the server rails s P.S. Make sure you set the username and password in Database.yml file and also ensure that database exists before running it. Then run migrations rake db:migrate Dependencies ( On which this app was tested ) : * Ruby version - ruby 2.2.1p85 * Database creation - This application uses Postgresql, So Make sure you create one :) Feel free to fork it and use your creativity. This was created to be very simple and it is :)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
